text: so once you get an idea there is this

potentially other people are going to

comes later in terms of you know getting
the criticism revising in the
publication process it's a creative
moment it's fantastic I was looking at a
decides about how much firms invested in

we were seeing Europe falling in terms
of productivity and the US economy
cannon very very productive and people
were calling this a puzzle they didn't
understand why that was happening and a
member start cutting in the data and
looking at how much were us

relative to other firms paid in the UK
and was this huge difference how much
could they gain from that investment in
technology and the returns were just
massively larger I said developing this
idea that US firms were fundamentally
different in the way they approached
technology it was the first time in this
was documented the paper was very well
published and I remember Bernanke

and new data and you want to make sense
